```{r, include=TRUE}
library(rstan)

rstan_options(auto_write = T)
options(mc.cores = parallel::detectCores())

stanmod <- stan_model("model/diff_model.stan")

ddata <- list(wt_c = c(6.975, 1.579, 0.381, 0.107, 0.057, 0.025), # Last data point isn't real
              ls_c = c(12.46, 7.44, 2.717, 1.967, 1.184, 0.540), # Fill in actual values
              dhs_c = c(6.975, 1.579, 0.381, 0.107, 0.057, 0.025)) # Fill in actual values
```

AA

```{r}
fitopt <- optimizing(stanmod, data = ddata, verbose = T, hessian = T)
```





```{r}
fit <- stan("model/diff_model.stan", data = ddata, verbose = T, chains = 8, iter = 200)
```

```{r}
pairs(fit)
```
